title: Messenger issue in my Pixel2 XL
content: I recently updated my Pixel 2 XL to the latest release of android, since then i start having some issues in messenger app, as shown in the shot below, when i try to send any kind of media to any person i'm talking with, well, this happens and i cannot see any of my media, which makes me look manually for the photos/videos i want to send and do it all manually, this only happens in messenger, so i cleared cash and storage, i even uninstalled and reinstalled the app completely, and i still have the issue till now!
